business.name: Experimentalists Anonymous
business.blurb: Design, build, and sell custom electronic devices; host audio circuit schematic archive with over three million downloads served; maintain online message board with over fourteen thousand posts; provide site hosting for do-it-yourself audio hardware enthusiasts; help individuals start successful independent businesses selling electronic audio devices

business.name: Noisette Audio, LLC
business.blurb: Provided consulting services in the field of audio signal processing, analysis, and synthesis; develop software for electronic music composition
